about_the_game:
Choose the best strategy, get supplies, and win. Survive, kill, fight the mysteries of the unknown, and experience undifferentiated strategic contests.
《Zoo Tales》 offers an exciting story and brings you a new multiplayer competitive experience.
You walked into the zoo in this city. It claims to include the vast majority of species suitable for zoo feeding in the world. You thought it would be an ordinary and pleasant distraction. Other tourists around you laughing and chatting think so.
Keep away from the rabbit. Don't break the rules. Believe in human beings. Stick to yourself. Keep calm and remember all the information that can help you. We must fight bravely
——And escape the zoo alive.
You will play the role of a tourist, an employee, or some strange messenger to seek survival in this abnormal zoo.
Do you want to obey the rules? Which one should you choose? Or make a choice with your own judgment?
—— Choose what you believe is right and defeat what you believe is wrong. See the truth and defend the dignity of life.
——"Unity, courage and unwavering loyalty are the greatest virtues of mankind."
——Now select the map in the story in online mode and join the game with your friends to start playing!
detailed_description:
Not recommended

Zoo Lore 0.7: Version is subject to playability and playability, not recommended to purchase at this stage. Version 0.7 contains only experimental content and almost no playable content. Therefore, if you want to play with your family and friends, please wait for the update to the official version of the game. Note: The current version contains experimental content only and is not recommended for purchase


About the Game

Choose the best strategy, get supplies, and win. Survive, kill, fight the mysteries of the unknown, and experience undifferentiated strategic contests. 《Zoo Tales》 offers an exciting story and brings you a new multiplayer competitive experience. You walked into the zoo in this city. It claims to include the vast majority of species suitable for zoo feeding in the world. You thought it would be an ordinary and pleasant distraction. Other tourists around you laughing and chatting think so. Keep away from the rabbit. Don't break the rules. Believe in human beings. Stick to yourself. Keep calm and remember all the information that can help you. We must fight bravely ——And escape the zoo alive. You will play the role of a tourist, an employee, or some strange messenger to seek survival in this abnormal zoo. Do you want to obey the rules? Which one should you choose? Or make a choice with your own judgment? —— Choose what you believe is right and defeat what you believe is wrong. See the truth and defend the dignity of life. ——"Unity, courage and unwavering loyalty are the greatest virtues of mankind." ——Now select the map in the story in online mode and join the game with your friends to start playing!
name: Zoo Tales

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GEFORCE GTX 1050 Ti (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-9100
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GEFORCE GTX 2060 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space

short_description: Choose the best strategy, get supplies, and win. Survive, kill, fight the mysteries of the unknown, and experience undifferentiated strategic contests. Zoo Tales offers an exciting story and brings you a new multiplayer competitive experience.
